title: I had issue about purchaising-(google nest protect device) other nest devices for myself in-(India)
content:
In my issues I had write to the experts from google store, My first creadiential issue is for purchaising-( google nest protect) 2-(google nest connect)  And other google devices from google store, the issue is that these devices are not available in my country-(India) , And experts says shipping of these devices are not available, my second issue is that I am purchaising several google devices than I am spend the money similar as my pocket money for purchaising these devices please help for this creadiential issue And please help myself for shiping in -(India) And purchaising these devices
 I am write my issue to the expert from -(google store) the expert said myself that you can 




subscribe google store emails And than in the future If the (google nest protect) device or other google devices are available in-(India) than you can purchaise these devices in-(India) But the most creadiential issue is that I am not know why am subscribe emails on google store.Please told the step by step process of subscribing the emails from google store.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel Stand
